judges: Before Stern, C.:. J., Stearne, Jones, Beta, Chibsey and Musmanno, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The court being equally divided, the judgment is affirmed on the opinion of the Superior Court, reported in 171 Pa. Superior Ct. 134, 90 A. 2d 314.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: James P. McArdle, with him Paul J. McArdle, for appellant.
Harry Estep, Assistant Deputy Attorney General, with him Charles D. Coll, Special Deputy Attorney General, and Robert E. Woodside, Attorney General, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Hershman, Appellant.
Argued May 25, 1953.
Before Stern, C.:. J., Stearne, Jones, Beta, Chibsey and Musmanno, JJ.
Appeal, No. 32,
reargument refused July 13,1953.
June 26, 1953:
James P. McArdle, with him Paul J. McArdle, for appellant.
Harry Estep, Assistant Deputy Attorney General, with him Charles D. Coll, Special Deputy Attorney General, and Robert E. Woodside, Attorney General, for appellee.
